defs: the state of darkness being absolutely silent.
a length of three cubits.
to chop off the nose; to dissgrace by cutting the nose of a person.
the act of chopping of the nose or of disgracing by cutting the nose.
= ಮೂಕೊರತಿ1.
= ಮೂಕರ್ಜಿ.
a division into three parts, groups or classes, (which are distinguished or opposed to each other).
(pl.) three branchs, prongs, etc.
to suffer within, without expressing audibly or without communicating it to others.
a measure of (of grain) three koḷagas.

a light, three-wheeled vehicle, with one wheel in front and two in back; a tricycle.

(jain.) the three spheres of air that envelops the earth.
to smell (a substance) by sniffing; to sniff.
a kind of bird.
to pierce through the wall beween two nostrils of an ox, buffalo, to string with a rope to control the animal.
to prod or pierce the nose.
(fig.) to put forward the face and bring the nose near an object as to grasp the smell of it.
a kind of small sized rat with a long snout.
a person with the nose chopped off; and not having it projecting as in the normal case.

the part of the face in humans hat contains the nostrils and the organs of smell and functions as the usual passage for air in respiration, formed of bone and cartilage, serving also to modify or modulate the voice or a part corresponding to this in animals; the nose.
the bill of a bird; beak.
the front end or point of termination.
the front part of a utensil.
the pointed end of a grain.
the condition of being not able to talk.
the front portion of a card where the yolk is fixed or tied.

ಮೂಗಿಲ್ಲದವಳಿಗೆ ಮೂಗುತಿ ಏಕೆ? mūgilladavaḷige mūguti ēke (prov.) why does anybody need something of which he or she has no use; ಮೂಗು ಹಿಡಿದರೆ ಬಾಯಿ ತಾನೇ ತೆರೆಯುತ್ತದೆ mūgu hiḍidre bāyi tānē tereyuttde (prov.) catch some vulnerable points, to get the truth out;ಮೂಗು ಮೇಲಾಗು mūgu mēlāgu to hold one's prestige high; ಮೂಗು ಹಾಕು mūgu hāku = ಮೂಗು ತೂರಿಸು; ಮೂಗು ಹಾಯಿಸು mūgu hāyisu = ಮೂಗು ತೂರಿಸು; ಮೂಗು ಹಿಡಿದು ಕೂರು mūgu hiḍidu kūru to depend on destiny, without putting forth the effort reqauired; ಮೂಗ ಕೊಯ್ mūga koy to bring shame or dishonour upon; to disgrace; ಮೂಗಿಗೆ ತುಪ್ಪ ಹಚ್ಚು mūgige tuppa haccu (fig.) something offered as a tantalizing but deceptive inducement; to lure; ಮೂಗು ಚಾಚು mūgu cācu = ಮೂಗು ತೂರಿಸು; ಮೂಗಿನವರೆಗೆ ಕೆಲಸ mūginavarege kelasa a restless, continuous work; ಮೂಗಿನವರೆಗೆ ಕುಡಿ mūginavarege kuḍi to drink (alholic liquors) beyond limit; ಮೂಗಿನಲಿ ಬೆರಳಿಡು mūginali beraḷiḍu = ಮೂಗಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ಬೆರಳಿಡು; ಮೂಗಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ಬೆರಳಿಡು mūgina mēle beraḷiḍu to be wonder-struck; ಮೂಗು ಹೋಗು mūgu hōgu to be disgraced; to lose one's respect, prestige; ಮೂಗಿಗೆ ಕವಡೆ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳ್ಳು mūgige kavaḍe kaṭṭikoḷḷu (fig.) to work hard and without rest; ಮೂಗುಳ್ಳವ mūguḷḷava (fig.) a man having self-respect; a proud man; ಮೂಗುಮುರಿ mūgu muri to sneer at; to scorn; to turn up one's nose at; ಮೂಗಿನ ನೇರಕ್ಕೇ ಮಾತನಾಡು mūgina nērakkē mātanāḍu (fig.) to talk, propose, plant etc. for one's self-advantage; ಇಡೀ ಮುಳುಗಿದರೂ, ಮೂಗು ಮೇಲೆ iḍī muḷugidarū, mūgu mēle (prov.) argue even though vanquished; ಮೂಗು ತಿಕ್ಕು mūgu tikku (fig.) to become speechles, answerless; ಮೂಗು ತೂರಿಸು mūgu tūrisu (fig.) to intrude in other's affairs, without being invited or asked for; ಮೂಗು ತಿಕ್ಕಿಸು mūgu tikkisu (fig.) to make another speechless or answerless; ಮೂಗಿನ ತುದಿಯಲ್ಲೇ ಕೋಪವಿರು mūgina tudiyallē kōpaviru to have a tendency to lose one's temper; to be easily or quickly angerd.

= ಮೂಲಸ್ಥಾನ -1.
a race of human beings, a species of animal or plant existing (in a place) from the beginning or from earliest days; an aboriginal.
a member of such a race of species.
a original letter, written text, etc., (as diff. from a copy of it).
the original writing of a writer; original text.
a man regarded as the forefather of a clan or family.
(phil.) the original nature from which the phenomenal world is created; the germ out of which matter of all apparent forms are evolved.
the original manuscript of a literary work, written by the author himself.
(yoga.) a particular position of fingers.
the core part of an army.
= ಮೂಲವಿಗ್ರಹ.
any of the basic mystic syllables.
a talisman bearing such a syllable or syllables.
the original form of a language.
of or forming a foundation or basis; basic; essential; fundamental.
relating to what is basic; radical.
most important; chief; fundamental.
'ಓಂ' the sacred syllable which is supposed to be the base of all hymns.
the main hymn.
the basic, fundamental or main aim (of a person, movement, nation, etc.).
any basic unit gen. accepted as a standard for measuring, weighing, the quantity, mass, distance, extent, etc.
the jasmine plant Jasminum calophyllum of Oleaceae family.
its flower.
= ಮೂಲವಿಗ್ರಹ.
any of the four sentients that are considered as basic ones and from which other sentiments are evolved.
= ಮೂಲವ್ಯಾಧಿ.
any of the three colours, as red, yellow or blue, which combination with others can produce various colours or their shades; a primary colour.
the Eternal and Fundamental Principle of the universe.
any substance that cannot be separated into different substances by ordinary chemical methods, and which, in combination with such other substances forms all matters.
the main and the original idol installed in the sanctum sanctorum of a temple.
inflammation of the vermiform appendix.
(gram.) a word in its original form, without any termination or morpheme.
the basic or primary education.
(jain.) the original or the earliest fraternity of digambara jaina monks (who do not wear clothes).
a main pillar (of a building or other structures).
(fig.) an important person considered as the main or sole supporter of an organisation, family, theory, etc.
the original inhabitancy of a human race, animal, etc.; the home.
the central, most important part of a temple, where the main idol is installed; the sanctum sanctorum.
a prominent or principal place.
one's native village, town or place.
that part of a building, most part of which is under the surface of the ground, and on which the superstructure is constructed; foundation.
the Supreme Being.
the air or atmosphere.
a man who founds or establishes; a founder.
any small organism or cell that can develop into a new individual; seed, germ, etc.; a spore.
a main support, prop of a structure organisation.
the basic principle of a development, movement, philosophy, rtc.
the depression in the centre of the surface of the abdomen indicating the point of attachment of the umbilical cord to the foetus; the navel.
the lowest of the six mystic circles in human body, supposed to be at between anus and the genital organ.
wrong form of ' ಮೂಲನಕ್ಷತ್ರ '.
the original meaning or literary meaning of a word.
having roots (as a plant).
having fundamental right to.
the fundamental right to cultivate a particular piece of land.
first in time or order of development; primitive; original; earliest; primary.
important; prominent; principal.
eating the roots, yams, etc. for food.
a man who lives on roots, yams, of plants (as a religious vow).
